alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; McPherson; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 10:15PM CDT until May 30 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Arthur County in west central Nebraska... Eastern Perkins County in southwestern Nebraska... Eastern Keith County in southwestern Nebraska... Western Lincoln County in southwestern Nebraska... Southern McPherson County in west central Nebraska... North central Hayes County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 1100 PM CDT/1000 PM MDT/. * At 1014 PM CDT/914 PM MDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 14 miles southeast of Arthur to Grant, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Grant, Tryon, Sutherland, Hershey, Paxton, Wallace, Madrid, Elsie, Sarben, Ringgold, Keystone, Sutherland Reservoir State Recreation Area, Roscoe, Grainton, Coker, O`Fallons, Nevens, Broganville, Big Bald Hill and Wild Horse Spring. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 59 and 76. Highway 92 between mile markers 193 and 214. Highway 97 between mile markers 10 and 26. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 130 and 168. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Arthur; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; McPherson; Perkins
